title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 2, ch. I, pt. 14 - Revenues And Refunds
content:

§ 14.1 - Audit of revenues by comptroller
§ 14.2 - Audit of refunds by comptroller

§ 14.4 - Unpaid checks outstanding more than one year
§ 14.5 - Revenue contracts approval
§ 14.6 - Repealed

R. & Regs. tit. 2, ch. I, pt. 14

Statutory authority: State Finance Law, § 8[14]
[FN*] Resolution filed March 5, 1962 was not published in the

Official Compilation. State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
